subject: ChainedRuntimeException While testing taglibs using Cactus
msgSnippet: Hi folks, I m trying to test a taglib class using cactus and trying to test it thru a browser. When I execute the test from browser using the following url
messageBody:
Hi folks,
I'm trying to test a taglib class using cactus and trying to test it
thru a browser. When I execute the test from browser using the
following url
http://localhost:8080/MyApp/ServletTestRunner?suite=TestTag
I get the following error on the browser

Failed to get the test results at
[http://localhost:8080/SGGCB/JspRedirector%5d"
type="org.apache.cactus.util.ChainedRuntimeException">org.apache.cactu
s.util.ChainedRuntimeException: Failed to get the test results at
[http://localhost:8080/SGGCB/JspRedirector%5d at

I tries looking up the archive but didn't find a solution. A couple
of more people have got the same problem

Can somebody help

Thx in advance
Praveen
